A vRu#~jjEq suva#H | 
paqtnIqsaqM~MyAqjAnupa# tE huvE savAqha(gm) sa#miShTayaqjurA da#dEq tava# || 
paqSUnth-suqtaM pu#rOqDASAqnth-sava#nAqnyOta yaqj~jaM | 
dEqvAnth-sEndrAqnupa# tE huvE savAqha-maqgnimu#KAqnth-sOma#vatOq yE caq viSvE$ || 32 
(upaq - grahaqmiDA#mAqSiShOq - dvAtri(gm)#Sacca) (A11)
